title: The Spinning Saviour: The Adventures of Charlie Mitchell
summary: Charlie Mitchell, a 63-year-old spinning instructor, discovers his ability to control time during his classes, using his powers to thwart crimes and save lives throughout a single week.
summaryGerman: Charlie Mitchell, ein 63-jähriger Spinning-Instruktor, entdeckt seine Fähigkeit, während seiner Kurse die Zeit zu kontrollieren. Er nutzt seine Kräfte, um Verbrechen zu vereiteln und Leben zu retten, innerhalb einer einzigen Woche.
summaryDutch: Charlie Mitchell, een 63-jarige spinning instructeur, ontdekt zijn vermogen om tijdens zijn lessen de tijd te beheersen. Hij gebruikt zijn krachten om misdaden te voorkomen en levens te redden gedurende een hele week.
summaryFrench: Charlie Mitchell, un instructeur de spinning de 63 ans, découvre sa capacité à contrôler le temps pendant ses cours, utilisant ses pouvoirs pour déjouer des crimes et sauver des vies tout au long d'une seule semaine.

story.text: While teaching a spinning class, Charlie Mitchell suddenly freezes time as a bike malfunction threatens a student. He manages the situation without anyone realizing.
News of a bank robbery reaches Charlie during a class. He pauses time, dashes to the scene, and helps hostages escape before resuming his session unnoticed.
Charlie feels the strain of his double life. He spends the day reflecting on his new powers and their impact, feeling a blend of responsibility and isolation.
During a power outage, Charlie uses his ability to maintain calm and order among his class participants, guiding them safely with his calming presence.
Charlie stops a potential subway accident by halting time, fixing a mechanical fault, and subtly guiding the maintenance team towards the problem.
A day off turns adventurous as Charlie discovers another time manipulator like himself. They spend the day exploring their limits and sharing stories.
Charlie decides to start a secret group for people with powers to train and discuss their roles as unsung heroes, feeling energized and hopeful.

ending: In a world that races against time, Charlie Mitchell pedals the future into safer paths.
moral: Great power comes with great responsibility, and even ordinary people can have extraordinary impacts.
